mapper.select: SELECT a.reply_id,a.reply_content,a.reply_flag,a.user_id,a.video_id,a.reply_playtime,a.reply_like_count,a.reply_dislike_count,a.reply_date,b.reply_vote_flag FROM media_comment.reply a LEFT JOIN reply_vote b ON a.user_id=b.user_id and a.reply_id=b.reply_id WHERE a.user_id=#{user_id} and a.video_id=#{video_id}
SELECT reply_vote_flag FROM reply_vote WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND reply_id=#{reply_id};
SELECT * FROM reply WHERE video_id=#{video_id} ORDER BY reply_like_count-reply_dislike_count DESC;
